Job Title: Java ATG Architect
Location: Remote (Must be willing to work in PST time zone)
Duration: Long term

Job Description:
Must be Very strong in Java/J2EE concepts in coding level.
Must have very strong communication skills.
Java ATG Architect with expertise in ATG Web commerce, Endeca search and microservices Architecture.
Extensive experience designing, developing, and optimising e-commerce platforms using Oracle ATG and Endeca.
The Ideal candidate will design, develop, and optimize scalable e-commerce solutions with a strong focus on cloud native applications and microservices deployment on GCP.
Should understand core architecture and domain concepts.
Should work on the shift left initiative (no dedicated testing team) – Should be able to test independently carry-out.
Very strong in communication and collaboration – should be able to talk to multiple stakeholders.
Must work on the assigned tasks and provide timely status updates.
Lead offshore Team to clarify all their queries and update them with the tasks to be completed.
